statements: SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData;
SELECT species_name, population FROM BiodiversityData WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT species_id, species_name FROM BiodiversityData ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM BiodiversityData WHERE population > 1000;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE conservation_status='Threatened' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE population > 100 ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM BiodiversityData WHERE population <= 50;
SELECT species_name, population FROM BiodiversityData WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' ORDER BY population ASC;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE conservation_status IN ('Critically Endangered', 'Vulnerable') ORDER BY species_id;
SELECT species_id, population, conservation_status FROM BiodiversityData WHERE species_name LIKE 'M%' OR population >= 200;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM Species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, observation_date, observation_location FROM Species s JOIN Observations o ON s.species_id = o.species_id WHERE s.population_size > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT observation_location FROM Observations ORDER BY observation_location DESC;
SELECT observer_name, observation_date FROM Observations WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT * FROM Species ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM Species WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT observation_id, observation_date, observer_name FROM Observations WHERE observation_location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, population_size, conservation_status FROM Species WHERE population_size < 5000;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM species ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT observation_date, observer_name FROM observations WHERE observer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM species WHERE conservation_status IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM species WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species_name ASC;

SELECT observation_date, species_name, location_name FROM observations INNER JOIN species ON observations.species_id = species.species_id INNER JOIN locations ON observations.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM species INNER JOIN locations ON species.species_id = locations.location_id WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90 AND longitude BETWEEN -180 AND 180;

SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) AS total_observations FROM observations INNER JOIN locations ON observations.location_id = locations.location_id GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_observations > 5 ORDER BY total_observations DESC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT scientific_name, common_name FROM Species ORDER BY scientific_name ASC;
SELECT common_name, population_size FROM Species WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Observations WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT scientific_name, common_name, population_size FROM Species ORDER BY scientific_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE habitat_type='Forest' ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT observation_id, species_id, location_id, observer_name, observation_date FROM Observations WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT effort_id, location_id, start_date, end_date, effort_description FROM ConservationEfforts ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_id, species_name, population_size FROM species;
SELECT species_name, geographic_range FROM species WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT * FROM sightings WHERE sighting_date='2023-01-15';
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, habitat_type FROM locations WHERE climate='Tropical';
SELECT * FROM species;
SELECT species_name, population_size, conservation_status FROM species WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT species_name, geographic_range FROM species WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY habitat_type DESC, climate ASC;

SELECT sighting_date, observer_name, species.species_name, locations.latitude, locations.longitude FROM sightings JOIN species ON sightings.species_id = species.species_id JOIN locations ON sightings.location_id = locations.location_id;
